actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Federation Employment and Guidance Service, New York, New York.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named nonprofit charity in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising out of losses incurred during a moratorium on certain purchases by the General Services Administration and a purchase freeze by the Office of Management and Budget.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Federation Employment and Guidance Service, New York, New York.
